DOC.brief_summary: This double blind , randomise , crossover study 12 healthy men 18 40 year . The design base 6 day : - day 1 : On day time administration LPS . - day 2 : On night time administration LPS . - day 3 : On day time administration LPS + Placebo . - day 4 : On day time administration LPS + melatonin . - day 5 : On night time administration LPS + placebo . - day 6 : On night time administration og LPS + melatonin . Measuring inflammatoric oxidative response LPS effect melatonin compare placebo endotoxaemia .
DOC.brief_title: Antiinflammatoric Antioxidative Effect Melatonin Human Endotoxaemia
DOC.criteria: Men Age 1849 year . Healthy No sleepiness disorder . No medication ASA I Allergia melatonin Women Smoking . Alcohol abuse .
